text: No worries. Just log in every few days and check to be sure too. Previously for my first HLE  I went in and check and saw that it was approved. At the end of that day then I got the notification
Changed to end of Aug already ğŸ˜ Received email
Did you apply for a flat under HDB's May BTO and SBF exercise? You will have to wait until August to get the ballot result.https://str.sg/iiS7
sbf seems to be end augbto first week of aug
Hi does anyone have updates for feb bto farrers field?
Flat allocation going on and around 60% done with my knowledge from the other group
Hi ğŸ‘‹ğŸ¼ Can i ask if my HLE expires on 01 Aug and my appointment is on the 03 Aug do i need to re-apply for HFE or how does it work?
u just wait for hdb officer to do on the spot for u for HLE

hiiii just checking  only when we recieve the invitation letter then we  realise we might have made a mistake in putting myself as ORD-ing  <12 months but in fact i ORD years ago. same for uni graduation <12 months but in fact we graduated longer than that. so now in the letter they are asking for ORD cert and grad cert etc toodoes anyone here encountered similar mistakes and how did u all rectify it?
U better explain to officer or call hdb
hello! i made the same mistake too. but when i went to select my flat  i just informed the officer and she kindly said she will help me change. i still brought along my grad cert incase~
hi !! does anyone knows for the bto option fee  when and how will it be refunded ? :)
There is no refund for the option fee
Hi just asking. During collection of key  if we dont have the shortfall amount will we still get to collect key? Is there options? Can any expert advise pls.
You mean OAs + max loan amount but still have shortfall?
if CPF + EHG + HLE still not enough to cover shortfall  u need to pay in cash
Yes if dont have that cash then how?
find all ways to borrow that cash or forfeit the flat
better to forfeit the $2k than a lifetime of debt and loans
Better that you donâ€™t buy that flat. Looks like finances are an issue for you  tbh
Hi all  anybody know is there any 3 room bto balance flat at Jurong west Crystal?
Hi all  anybody know is there any 3 room bto balance flat at nanyang opal?
No refund  it is supposed to form part of the entire payment
Hdb would give a period of time for you to find the cash to the balance. If forfeit  not sure if the 5% down payment will be returned or forfeit.
Previously will be credited to bank account weeks/months after you sign your lease. But it seems that now is credited to cpf instead.
option fee forms as part of ur downpayment
if forfeit they wont return u the option fee nor 5% downpayment
Oh. Mine was returned when i went to sign agreement & made the 5% downpayment previously.
The last project we know can return option fees is 2020 August bto project
After that they change the rules not to refund
Hi guys  My partner recently just quit her job and now she can't retrieve her payslips from her manager in time for flat selection. Liddat How ah?
Why can't she retrieve from her HR ah
It's her right to retrieve payslips
If leave company in good terms should be able to get right.
I had the same issue.. but the selection officer was very nice  said use CPF contribution statement will be sufficient
Sbux jialat  so leceh wanna get the payslips  especially after u cao
You can complain to MOM or something if they refuse to give you your payslips lol
But ya  CPF contribution statement should be good enough to get a rough idea of your payslip
Hi. Any idea if we already booked a flat and spouse got retrenched from company and no cpf contributions for past months  what will happen for 2nd appointment when we go for the sign lease agreement?
If there's shortfall even after the grants  loans and total cpf  we need to fork out cash for the sign lease agreement?
u need to find all ways to get the cash
either by maxing out your credit cards / bank loans
companies are required to keep for 1 year even after the employee has left
but if u are in that dire financial situation  might as well reconsider if u really want to commit to a HDB flat first  might as well stay in current flat and wait till spouse got job
Yup i thought of forgo-ing the flat. What will happen if i forgo it?
before signing of lease agreement  if u forego it  you will forfeit the option fee + one year cannot apply for BTO / resale with housing grant
better than forfeit after signing of lease
Ok noted! Thank you for your reply.
Do i need to do anything to forgo it?
u can write in to hdb using their efeedback form that u wish to cancel the flat application
